name: lucide-to-tid
description: convert Lucide svgs to .tid usable by TiddlyWiki5

scripts.build: npm run build-tw-plugin && npm run build:edition-lucide-all && npm run make-docs
scripts.build-tw-plugin: npm run build:icons && npm run build:outlined && npm run optimize:outlined-tw && npm run optimize:outlined-lucide && npm run build:plugin
scripts.prepare:outlined-tw: npm run build:icons && npm run build:outlined
scripts.make-docs: tiddlywiki ./edition/lucide --output docs --build index && tiddlywiki ./edition/lucide-all --output docs --build lucide-all

author: pmario
